title: (x) Graffiti font - various {gang}
content:
Hi Guys,

Trying to identify this graffiti font, can anyone help?

[http://www.chrisjovanov.com/font/identify.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080213204812/http:/www.chrisjovanov.com/font/identify.jpg "http://www.chrisjovanov.com/font/identify.jpg")

Chris

 [‹ Need help to determine green oblique sans in Hasselberg logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080213204812/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13431 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Monmouthshire Radio - Berlinsans {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080213204812/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13423 "Go to next forum topic")
author: kristo

comments.content:
_Just a note.:_ Graffiti lettering / ’tagging’ normally IS ’handdrawn’ and this sure looks like that, as well.. _( For example.: Similar characters look different.: ’A’, ’S’.. Soo, I dont think this is an actual ’font’.. )_

Got any more samples, Chris.?  
Any other / different characters.?

_Still.: Various_ ’ [Tag Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080213204812/http:/www.pizzadude.dk/)’_, by Jakob Fischer / Pizzadude, and,_ ’ [Graffiti Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080213204812/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/graffiti/)’_, at typOasis_..

Thanks for your help,

I do have one more image but your probably right about it being hand drawn

[http://www.chrisjovanov.com/font/identify2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080213204812/http:/www.chrisjovanov.com/font/identify2.jpg "http://www.chrisjovanov.com/font/identify2.jpg")

Chris

not the same font, but the same idea:  
 [http://www2.wind.ne.jp/maniackers/monday.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080213204812/http:/www2.wind.ne.jp/maniackers/monday.html "http://www2.wind.ne.jp/maniackers/monday.html")
I think this is really close to [Subway](http://web.archive.org/web/20080213204812/http:/www.b-boys.com/graffitifonts.html).. not sure where the font originates, though, I could check my info on it..

It’s difficult to match a graffiti style and it’s likely that it was drawn (at least the paint drips).

There are a lot of graffiti fonts at [**Graffitifonts.com**](http://web.archive.org/web/20080213204812/http:/www.graffitifonts.com/fonts.shtml)

Try looking at Grand Stylus and Fatboy Slim.  
Here’s the word [**“Saturdays”**](http://web.archive.org/web/20080213204812/http:/www.acmedigital.net/JianSabu/images/Saturdays.gif) in Fatboy Slim.

————————————————————-  
Yes, I’m old, but I’m back in style!
thanks for all your help guys
